actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to exclude from gross income certain distributions from a qualified terminated plan.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income, for income tax purposes, certain distributions made from a qualified terminated employee benefit plan. Requires that such distributions must have been transferred to an individual retirement account by the taxpayer on a specific date. Defines a "qualified terminated plan" as a pension plan with respect to which a notice of a sufficiency was issued by the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation on December 2, 1976 and which was terminated by corporate action on February 20, 1976.

titles.title: A bill to exclude from gross income certain distributions from a qualified terminated plan.
